title: Greater Albion Typefounders Releases Braxia
content:
Braxia is a fine piece of fun inspired by the spirit of the 1930's, and has just been released on Myfonts.com

For the moment the family consists of two styles, regular:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100240im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Braxia_5609.gif)

and Embossed:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100240im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Braxia_Embossed_5855.gif)

I see this as useful in posters and designing logos, particularly where an Art Deco flavour is wanted.
author: Rasendyll
